helpText: 한_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________빠.

generic.title: 한_Error updating categories__________________________빠
generic.message: 한_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________빠.

maxDepthExceeded.title: 한_Error updating categories__________________________빠
maxDepthExceeded.message: 한_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________빠.

destinationHasSameName.title: 한_Error updating categories__________________________빠
destinationHasSameName.message: 한_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________빠.

noSchema.title: 한_Schema not found_________________빠
noSchema.message: 한_Item schema not found for user_________________빠.

maxCharacter.title: 한_Error updating categories__________________________빠
maxCharacter.message: 한_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________빠.

deleteInUseCategory.title: 한_Delete category________________빠
deleteInUseCategory.message: 한_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________빠.

custom.title: 한_Custom categories__________________빠
custom.message: 한_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________빠.

arcgis.title: 한_ArcGIS categories__________________빠
arcgis.message: 한_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________빠.

iso.title: 한_ISO categories_______________빠
iso.message: 한_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________빠.

inspire.title: 한_INSPIRE categories___________________빠
inspire.message: 한_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________빠.
